actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.subcommittee: Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition and Forestry.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition, and Forestry

official_title: To amend the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to increase the nutritional assistance block grant for Puerto Rico, and for other purposes.
short_title: Fair Nutrition for American Citizens Act of 2001

summary.text: Fair Nutrition for American Citizens Act of 2001 - Amends the Food Stamp Act of 1977 respecting food stamp block grants for the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico to: (1) consolidate funding for Puerto Rico and American Samoa; (2) extend funding, with increased FY 2002 amounts; (3) permit specified FY2002 expenditures for data system upgrades and eligibility system implementation; and (4) obligate funds for full annual payment of a specified nutrition assistance program in American Samoa.

titles.title: Fair Nutrition for American Citizens Act of 2001
To amend the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to increase the nutritional assistance block grant for Puerto Rico, and for other purposes.
